column1: Baby Barnaby's////Like everyone else who comes here
column2: the green eggs are superb.  Super fluffy eggs that are perfectly cooked
column3: with a very tasty charred sausage and perfectly cooked potatoes.  The potatoes are crispy as chips on the outside
column4: yet soft fluffy mashed-potato consistency in the middle.  Perfectly seasoned
column5: and everything marries so well together.  They also offer freshly squeezed orange juice
column6: which i am a sucker for every single time.
